title: What books are you reading right now?
body:
I love reading and thought I would ask what books/comics/etc others are currently reading.

I am on a bit of a Sci-Fi kick lately. At the moment I am reading [Leviathan Wakes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leviathan_Wakes) by James S. A. Corey. It's pretty great so far. 

I just found out that SyFy is making a TV Series based on it, which is pretty cool. Though I am not going to get hyped for it as SyFy hasn't had very good track record lately...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kQuTAPWJxNo
